    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];

        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {

                    waitForIt();`;

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);

                };

                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })

    const body = document.getElementsByClassName('b-lesson__text')[0];
    const iframes = body.querySelectorAll('iframe[id]');
    iframes.forEach(frame => {
        const urlParams = new URL(frame.src);
        const isVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('type') === 'video';
        if (!isVideo) return;
        
        const fileId = urlParams.searchParams.get('fileId');
        const preview = urlParams.searchParams.get('preview');
        const courseId = urlParams.searchParams.get('courseId');
        const isAuthor = urlParams.searchParams.get('isAuthor') === '1';
        const isFirstVideo = urlParams.searchParams.get('isFirstVideo') === '1';

        frame.addEventListener('load', () => {
            let frameDocument = frame.contentDocument || frame.contentWindow.document;
            const videoElement = frameDocument.querySelectorAll('video')[0];

            const skipPromo = localStorage.getItem('skipTranscriptionPromo');
            $.get(`/api/v2/course/${ courseId }/file/${ fileId }/transcript`, function(response) {
                if(!!response) {
                    let insertOpenElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertOpenElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                    let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                    let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionOpenTemplate-${ fileId }', '${ isAuthor || window.isCurator ? 'transcriptionOpenTemplate' : 'transcriptionStudent'}', { fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }',
                            transcriptionId: '${ response.data.id }', paragraphs: ${ JSON.stringify(response.data.status === 'published' ? response.data.paragraphs ?? [] : []) }, setTime: ${ JSON.stringify({ frame: frame.id, video: videoElement?.id }) } });
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;

                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);
                    frame.after(insertOpenElement);
                    frame.after(scriptContainer);
                }
            }).fail(function() {
                if (!isAuthor) {
                    return;
                }
                let insertVideoElement = document.createElement('div');
                insertVideoElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }`);
                let scriptContainer = document.createElement('div');
                
                let scriptWaiterVideo = document.createElement('script');
                scriptWaiterVideo.text = `
                var waitForIt = function() {
                    if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                        setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                    } else {
                        window.load_react('transcriptionVideoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionBadgeTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }', hide: ${ isFirstVideo }});
                    }
                };
                waitForIt();`;

                if (isFirstVideo && skipPromo !== 'true') {
                    let insertElement = document.createElement('div');
                    insertElement.setAttribute('id', `transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }`);

                    let scriptWaiterPromo = document.createElement('script');
                    scriptWaiterPromo.text = `
                    var waitForIt = function() {
                        if (typeof load_react === "undefined") {
                            setTimeout(waitForIt, 100);
                        } else {
                            window.load_react('transcriptionPromoTemplate-${ fileId }', 'transcriptionPromoTemplate', { preview: '${ preview }', fileId: '${ fileId }', courseId: '${ courseId }'});
                        }
                    };
                    waitForIt();`;
                    frame.after(insertElement);
                    scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterPromo);
                }
                frame.after(insertVideoElement);
                scriptContainer.appendChild(scriptWaiterVideo);

                frame.after(scriptContainer);
            })
        })
    })
